title: cmd/go: go get failed showing unrecognised import path
body:
I am trying to build a websocket-based signaling server in **Go** called in **Collider** .
I followed the guide in [github/webrtc/apprtc/collider](https://github.com/webrtc/apprtc/tree/master/src/collider)
The command `go get collidermain` doesn't work and shows that:
``` 
package collidermain: unrecognized import path "collidermain"
```
I tried the methods others come up with in [stack overflow](http://stackoverflow.com/questions/20458796/unrecognized-import-path-with-go-get) but they didn't work.
Thanks in advance for you help.
